item.description:
NEW DATE

Let's meet for lunch at Joyful Garden

"Joyful Garden is a full service Chinese Restaurant convenience located in Brighton, MA Days Hotel. It specializes in preparing the freshest seafood and authentic Chinese food. From our relaxing atmosphere to full-bar services, we welcome you to come in and enjoy!"

We were invited by family for dinner here and thought it was so good that we had our daughter's 3rd birthday party here this past winter.

It's a bit of a hidden gem--nobody would ever know there was a decent restaurant inside a hotel of this sort.

Good food and it beats paying for parking in Boston!

All the kiddies and daddies welcome to join us!

If we have enough interest, they have a private room we could request for a group.

http://www.joyfulgardenboston.com/
item.how_to_find_us: Restaurant is just off the front lobby. Park in the hotel lot.
